pages.title: Blood Orchid Products
pages.text: Extracts of the [Blood Orchid](book://resources/blood_orchid) have an intense effect when consumed: they may put you in a [#](449900)Frenzy[#]().\Damage, attack speed, movement speed and knockback resistance are buffed with each kill. The higher the effects level, the higher the buff. Not scoring a kill in 10 seconds will debuff you instead.

pages.title: Frenzy Stacking
pages.text: Instead of resetting the duration, applying another [#](449900)Frenzy[#]() effect will increase its potency instead.\\In order to get the most out of the effect apply one with a long duration first, then stack up seems to be most effective.
A Petals active ingredient can be extracted into a thick solution. Almost smells like rose water, but its effect is definitely... _a little more effervescent_.
The [#](449900)Frenzy[#]() effect you may get is starts out low, but lasts a bit longer.
The [#](449900)Frenzy[#]() effect you may get is relatively short, but starts out quite high.

pages.title: Rabbit Poison
pages.text: A truly nasty brew. Tastes exactly what you would expect.
